success.description: If the request was successful or not

user_id.description: The ID of the user to associate the file with

deal_id.description: The ID of the deal to associate the file with

person_id.description: The ID of the person to associate the file with

org_id.description: The ID of the organization to associate the file with

product_id.description: The ID of the product to associate the file with

activity_id.description: The ID of the activity to associate the file with

add_time.description: The date and time when the file was added/created. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

update_time.description: The last updated date and time of the file. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

file_name.description: The original name of the file

active_flag.description: Whether the user is active or not. false = Not activated, true = Activated

inline_flag.description: Whether the file was uploaded as inline or not

remote_location.description: The location type to send the file to. Only googledrive is supported at the moment.

remote_id.description: The ID of the remote item

cid.description: The ID of the inline attachment

s3_bucket.description: The location of the cloud storage

mail_message_id.description: The ID of the mail message to associate the file with

mail_template_id.description: The ID of the mail template to associate the file with

deal_name.description: The name of the deal associated with the file

person_name.description: The name of the person associated with the file

org_name.description: The name of the organization associated with the file

product_name.description: The name of the product associated with the file

url.description: The URL of the download file

name.description: The visible name of the file
